

Steps for creating a Visual Studio Project:
  1.  Go to File->New Project.
  2.  Select "Empty Project".
  3.  Give it the name "OBGCore" and call the solution "OnlineBoardGame".
  4.  Right-click the solution, and go to Add->New Project
  5.  Call the new project "OBGClient"
  6.  Make another project the same way called "OBGServer"
  7.  Right-click OBGClient and go to Project Dependencies
  8.  Check OBGCore
  9.  Right-click OBGClient->Properties
  10. Switch the configuration to All Configurations
  11. Navigate to Configuration Properties->VC++ Directories
  12. Hilight Include Directories and click edit
  13. Add the OBGCore directory
  14. Save
  15. Repeat steps 7-14 for OBGServer
  16. Add the code files to the directories
  17. For each project, right-click->Add->Existing Item
  18.   Hilight all source and header files and click ok
  19. Congratulations!
